Loues sacrifice A tragedie receiued generally well. Acted by the Queenes Majesties Seruants at the Phœnix in Drury-lane. Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.
[84] p.
Printed by I[ohn] B[eale] for Hugh Beeston, dwelling next the Castle in Cornhill, London : 1633.
Dedication signed: Iohn Ford. Signatures: pi¹ (=L4) A² B-K⁴ L⁴ (-L4, = pi). Reproduction of the original in an unidentified library.
=======
